description: Visual LinkedIn for creatives - UK/EU-focused professional network connecting creative talent with clients, agencies, and companies
primary_use: Professional networking, portfolio showcase, job hunting, and client acquisition for creative professionals in Europe

object_details.OBJ-BIZ-001: The Dots Profile - Professional creative portfolio with projects, skills, and availability
object_details.OBJ-BIZ-002: The Dots Project - Portfolio case study with visual showcase

content_types.portfolio_projects: Visual case studies with images and descriptions (60%)
content_types.job_applications: Responses to briefs and job listings (10%)

technical_specs.project_images: High-quality JPG or PNG (1200px width minimum)

optimal_posting.consistency: Regular profile updates show active status

algorithm_factors.profile_completeness: 100% complete profiles rank higher in search
algorithm_factors.skills_match: Accurate skills tagging improves search results
algorithm_factors.response_rate: Quick replies to messages increase ranking

best_practices: Complete 100% of profile (bio, skills, location, availability)
Mirror best Behance case studies on The Dots
Actively connect with agencies and brands in your niche
Tag projects accurately with relevant skills
Include business results in project descriptions
Apply to relevant briefs quickly (early applicants noticed)
Network at The Dots events (virtual and in-person)
Cross-promote profile on LinkedIn and other platforms
Use premium features if serious about client acquisition
Showcase diverse projects to demonstrate range

profile_structure.header: Professional photo, cover image, availability badge
profile_structure.bio: Elevator pitch (what you do, who you help, unique value)
profile_structure.portfolio: 5-10 best projects with images and case studies

project_showcase_best_practices.title: Clear, descriptive (e.g., 'Brand Identity for FinTech Startup')

client_acquisition_strategy.profile_optimization: Keywords in bio, skills, project titles
client_acquisition_strategy.availability_signal: Open for work badge if seeking clients
client_acquisition_strategy.response_time: Reply within 2-4 hours during business hours
client_acquisition_strategy.portfolio_quality: Only showcase best, most relevant work
client_acquisition_strategy.featured_work: Pin best project to profile top
client_acquisition_strategy.case_study_depth: Show problem-solving, not just pretty visuals

networking_tactics.connect_strategically: Target agencies, brands, fellow creatives in your niche
networking_tactics.personalize_requests: Mention shared interests or mutual connections
networking_tactics.engage_with_content: Like and comment on others' projects and posts
networking_tactics.offer_value: Share insights, answer questions, provide feedback
networking_tactics.collaborate: Partner with complementary creatives for projects

job_board_strategy.tailored_applications: Customize cover letter and portfolio for each
job_board_strategy.portfolio_link: Direct to most relevant case studies
job_board_strategy.salary_transparency: The Dots encourages transparent pay discussions

briefs_strategy.how_to_apply: Respond with pitch, relevant work samples, estimated quote
briefs_strategy.speed_matters: Clients often choose from first 10-20 responses
briefs_strategy.personalization: Address client by name, reference their specific needs
briefs_strategy.portfolio_relevance: Link ONLY to similar past work
briefs_strategy.follow_up: If no response in 5 days, polite check-in

recommendations_strategy.how_to_ask: Direct message or email with template
recommendations_strategy.make_it_easy: Provide bullet points client can use

performance_metrics.profile_views: Traffic to your profile (100+/month is good)
performance_metrics.search_appearances: How often you appear in search results

premium_membership_benefits.analytics: Who viewed your profile, search terms used
premium_membership_benefits.featured_profile: Chance to be showcased by The Dots

the_dots_better_for: Direct client hiring and job applications

integration_opportunities: Cross-post Behance case studies to The Dots
Link The Dots profile from LinkedIn
Mention The Dots profile in email signature
Share The Dots projects on social media
Include in portfolio website as client testimonial source
Reference in job applications as portfolio link
Network from The Dots to LinkedIn connections
common_use_cases: Finding freelance creative work in UK/EU
Researching agencies and brands to work with
Community learning via discussions and Q&A
Establishing credibility in UK/EU creative market

community_engagement.qa: Ask and answer creative professional questions
community_engagement.newsletters: Weekly digest of jobs, projects, insights
community_engagement.social_causes: The Dots promotes diversity and inclusion

trust_building_signals.clear_availability: Open for work badge if applicable
trust_building_signals.engagement: Likes, comments show active community member

conversion_funnel.discovery: Client searches for skill or browses featured creatives
conversion_funnel.profile_view: Client clicks to view full profile
conversion_funnel.inquiry: Client sends message or brief invitation
conversion_funnel.conversation: Back-and-forth on project scope and fit
conversion_funnel.proposal: You send detailed proposal and quote

pros: Active job board with quality opportunities
Premium features for serious job seekers
Less saturated than LinkedIn for creatives
cons: Briefs may have low pay (need to filter)
Requires active engagement to see results

demographics.profession: Designers, videographers, marketers, developers, writers, photographers
demographics.industry: Creative agencies, media, fashion, advertising, tech
